channel.title: Lesa on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Lesa on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – September 2, 2019
item.description: Everyone slept in a little bit. The kids were cracking up when I started reading some of the old kid quotes. Kids very rambunctious and Lesa decided they needed exercise so after lunch we took them to Milwaukee Trail and walked to Wilson Park and back, that solved that. Took them to Jiffy Treat and stopped for milk before heading home. Dillan helped me put away tent. Ashley took care of her rabbits.

item.title: Status Update – September 1, 2019
item.description: Woke up to Nerf gun fight in the house. Put a stop to that and started breakfast. Skipped church, everyone up too late, needed the sleep. Dillan and Gabe went to his house around 9, came back half-an-hour later with Gracie. All the kids had fun playing with each other even tough Lesa and I had our fill. They ate lunch with us and we sent them home. We discussed the night with Dillan and Ashley because we really didn’t like some of the behavior we saw.

item.title: Status Update – August 31, 2019
item.description: Took Dillan to guitar lessons, not sure if he’s learning anything but he seems to enjoy going, doesn’t practice much. After lunch we all went with Lesa to get her hair cut at Fantastic Sams in Bedford and then went to Walmart to get Ashley some white tennis shoes for cheerleading. Let the kids get donuts too. Set up the tent for Dillan and Gabe, he’s spending the night. Built a fire, we all joined in on marshmallows and S’mores and hot dogs.

item.title: Status Update – August 30, 2019
item.description: It’s Friday and Labor Day weekend, we get Monday off. Totally missed the bus, dropped kids off at school. Payday Friday, so I bought donuts for the shop per usual. Long, long day! Got off work at 3:00p and even gave them an extra hour. Took long leisurely drive through the countryside to pick up kids, truck started having transmission problems half way there, didn’t want to pull or kick down into lower gear.

item.title: Status Update – August 29, 2019
item.description: Barely made the bus, Kim waited for the kids to get on board. Took an alternate, scenic route to work, highway under construction and down to one lane. Spent most of day doing research. Lesa having her own problems at work. Both of us pretty zoned out by the time we get home. Mrs. Davis texted us, Dillan punched William in the eye and got in trouble for it. I was none to happy!

item.title: Status Update – August 28, 2019
item.description: Better at getting ready this morning, managed to get everything done, made bus easily. Scientia all day, got a crap load done even with build issues. Boys seemed ready to go home when I picked them up. Ashley had cheer practice, issues over her shoes not being good enough, learned movements to last weeks’ cheer, Lesa picked her up at school after practice. Dillan has brought his agenda home last two nights, did okay work for Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – August 27, 2019
item.description: Kids still tired after getting up, missed bus, dropped them off at school. Started workday at SAIC and went to Scientia mid-morning. Picked up kids late, they were making slime and got upset with me for coming so early. Ashley didn’t take care of her rabbits until we got on her. She was having troubles, talked back to us a lot, got emotional a few times. Dillan had multiple meltdowns over doing his homework, cried, and general didn’t want to do it, total drama.

item.title: Status Update – August 26, 2019
item.description: Monday. Rained all night, downpour sprung live trap, fixed chicks tarp in preparation of storms, and still made bus on time. Worked in Bloomington and then SAIC around noon for rest of the day. Got ECT sensor from NAPA, then picked up kids. Kids stuck inside, boys not too bad, Ashley a mess, meltdown on lack of friends, another because Lesa doesn’t love her enough, thinks she gets into trouble for disrespecting when Dillan pees the bed, blah, blah, blah, drama!

item.title: Status Update – August 25, 2019
item.description: Slept in, skipped church, everyone needed the extra rest. Got a young opossum in the live trap; Dillan, Bruce and I released it near Springville Cemetery West. After lunch, we went to Mike Pearson’s to discuss the house, going forward, Lesa is comfortable, more so than me. Kids took A/V ride down to Ken and Cassie’s place, we picked them up there, they were getting A/V rides and checked out a cave on their property.

item.title: Status Update – August 24, 2019
item.description: Woke up to kids screaming and putting their hands on each other – idiot, stupid, butt head, etc. Grounded all of them from screens of all types for entire weekend: no TV, tablets, phones, YouTube on computer, clock on microwave, etc. It was like we sentenced them to hell judging by all the wails, moans and groans we received. Went to Rural King and bought Ashley’s pet play area, would be great for chickens, will be used for rabbits.

item.title: Status Update – August 23, 2019
item.description: Friday, long week! Missed bus taking care of chickens and rabbits but not late, still beat bus riders. Got off and picked up kids early, boys played in mud, Ashley read for 40 minutes per assignment. Lesa grocery shopped. Pizza. Watched Open Season I and II. Kids had a good time.

item.title: Status Update – August 22, 2019
item.description: School and work. Busy day. Rained. Lesa picked up kids, took them to school, Girl Scouts had signup event and Ashley was a part of it. I picked her up. Got home and everyone had ate supper but us! We were only gone 10 minutes. American Ninja Warrior for rest of night. Kids tired!

item.title: Status Update – August 21, 2019
item.description: Chick fine. Texts from Albert, Boy Scout leader, pissing me off. Bus, school, daycare. Long productive work day. Lesa 5 miles on FitBit by 10a! Ashley’s first day of cheerleading practice, went well, Lesa picked up Ashley. I got boys, then got girls, we ate at Buffalo Wild Wings.

item.title: Status Update – August 20, 2019
item.description: School, work. A chick not well. Stormed. Left early, Lesa and I met with Hoosier Hills about construction loan. Took Dillan to Scouts, says he was bullied, pushed, threatened; not sure what happened, feel like Dillan exaggerated boys being boys; regardless, he doesn’t want to go.

item.title: Status Update – August 19, 2019
item.description: School, work, kids missed bus messing around. Truck running bad. Boys had Cub Scouts, got their books, Ashley went with. Ashley hit Bruce in drive-by, I did same to her, she went into drama mode, maybe she’ll stop? Dillan brought school papers home, had 40% on last spelling test.

item.title: Status Update – August 18, 2019
item.description: Church, kid’s first communion, Dillan spilled on his pants. Lesa took Ashley shopping for white sport bra for cheerleading. After chores Dillan went to Gabe’s, boys tablet time. Ashley unloaded/loaded dishwasher, got tablet too. Kids total asses to each other. Wouldn’t go to bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 17, 2019
item.description: Took Dillan to his first guitar lesson by Ken Tussey, Dillan didn’t offer much feedback. Picked up 6 fryers, fixed up brooder coop, Rural King for supplies. Got a little rain. Dillan played at Gabe’s. Everybody fighting, Lesa and Ashley going at it, I’m the bad guy always. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – August 16, 2019
item.description: Bed trashed my back, too soft. School picture day, kids looked good when they left, except Bruce with his scraped up face. Work okay, glad it’s Friday. Lesa grocery shopped. I picked up kids, got home in time to help carry groceries. Pizza and a movie, watched Avengers, End Game.

item.title: Status Update – August 15, 2019
item.description: New bed okay, we both thought it was hot but slept well. School bus by mere seconds! Worked late, barely got kids in time, no time for Ashley to eat dinner before Lesa drove her to Scouts. Boys played. I picked her up. Told her to take care of rabbits or else, cried, super tired!

item.title: Status Update – August 14, 2019
item.description: Kids had school; Lesa took PTO to clean bedroom; I worked from home. Took delivery of bedroom suite, our first, only took 37 years! Lunch with Lesa at McAlister’s. Helped Lesa rearrange and clean bedroom. Picked up kids. Nothing scheduled, kids spent evening playing, watching TV.

item.title: Status Update – August 13, 2019
item.description: School, work, SAIC again. Got kids early. Started to fix shower drain, needed ‘O’ ring, Lowe’s with kids. Frosties. Finished drain, Dillan went into crawlspace with me, held light. Lesa took Dillan to Boy Scouts. Changed ECT sensor. Got Dillan, mad at me, said no to camp in Ohio.

item.title: Status Update – August 12, 2019
item.description: School, IU, Scientia and SAIC. Truck overheating, put in thermostat, fans not kicking on, will try sensor tomorrow. Located shower drain after trying four places. Took Dwyane and Bruce to Cub Scouts, Ashley went with, Bruce misbehaved. Dillan helped me put deck belt on lawnmower.

item.title: Status Update – August 11, 2019
item.description: Church. I baptized Ashley and Dillan! Praise God! How awesome is that‽ We took Kathy Mitchell and Paul and Andrea Fries to El Ranchero for lunch, we all had a great time! Fantastic Sams for kid haircuts. Bought Lesa bedroom suite/mattress at Living Room Center. Truck overheating.

item.title: Status Update – August 10, 2019
item.description: Kind of slept in, hauled trash, Lowe’s for rabbit playpen materials. Tried fixing leaky shower drain, couldn’t find supplies. Started building playpen with Ashley. Cub Scout End of Summer Pool Party, Ashley invited Emma, thought she would spend night but didn’t. Everyone had fun!

item.title: Status Update – August 9, 2019
item.description: Friday! Everyone tired, even kids. Worked, kids school/daycare. Bruce tried handstand at daycare, wound up face planting, rug burns/scrapes week before school pics. Abraham’s last day, my job just got harder. Pizza and movie, Ashley won but let Bruce pick The Secret Life of Pets.

item.title: Status Update – August 8, 2019
item.description: School, daycare for kids. Work for Lesa and me. Kids obviously tired but handled it well. Fought like cats and dogs at breakfast, made them get down. Mrs Malone texted us to say Ashley is a doll and she enjoys having her in class. Ashley gave us massages. American Ninja Warriors.

item.title: Status Update – August 7, 2019
item.description: School day #2, rode bus, no homework, kids still excited, phone blew up from pics/notes. Took Lesa to lunch at Taste of India, had their buffet, very nice break from hectic work day. Two minutes past cutoff getting kids, no one noticed. Kids chatter boxes talking about their day.

item.title: Status Update – August 6, 2019
item.description: First day of 2019-2020 school year! Rode bus. Bruce 1st, Dwyane 2nd, Ashley 4th, Dillan 5th. Wow! Mrs Willis, Mrs Day, Mrs Malone, Mrs Davis. No homework, teachers/pupils getting to know each other. Little Starr’s. They had good day, could tell they were tired. Rest of us worked.

item.title: Status Update – August 5, 2019
item.description: Daycare, work, Lesa worked from home. She took Ashley and Dwyane to doctor for their physicals, took them to daycare after. Picked kids up, picked Lesa up, headed to school for Teacher Meet and Greet, got info and put up their supplies. Showers all around. Bed earlier than usual.

item.title: Status Update – August 4, 2019
item.description: Family Sunday, kids sang. Went to Bloomington, ate at Cozy Table on 3rd. Went to Kohl’s for school shoes. On Great Clips sign-up list – bumped us anyway – never going back! Lowe’s. Went to barber in Bedford, booked for rest of day. Walmart. Fixed Bruce’s bike. Grilled salmon. TV.

item.title: Status Update – August 3, 2019
item.description: Slept in, kids sitting quietly in living room, first time ever. Ashley bridged from Brownie to Junior, it was nice. Boys rode bikes and played while Lesa and Ashley ordered school cloths. Water main broke. Nicole’s, slaughtered Ken Tussey’s meat chickens. Tacos, TV, showers, bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 2, 2019
item.description: Friday! Work week finally over. Daycare, IU, Scientia. Did nothing after picking up kids, nice not having to rush someplace. Pizza and a movie – not! Kids fighting over seats, and movie, so ate at table with us. Settled enough afterward to watch new Disney movie Dumbo on Blu-Ray.

item.title: Status Update – August 1, 2019
item.description: Caught raccoon in live-trap again. Daycare, Jessica’s pool. Dr Hoff called, no blood in urine, PSA went from 4.6 to 1.6, follow-up January, every 6 months thereafter. It’s great news, on Tuesday I had 5 year expectancy. Lesa took boys to last night of swim lessons, passed, party!

item.title: Status Update – July 31, 2019
item.description: Truck trans struggled this AM. Kids daycare, Lesa IU, me Bloomington. Gave urine, blood samples before going in. Took boys to swim lessons, Ashley went with, got Frosties, checked out kayaks at Dunham’s, Thorton Park, talked about last visit with Nicolle. Lesa flowers, Dillan TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 30, 2019
item.description: Dropped kids at daycare, swam at Jessica’s. Lesa worked. Appointment with Dr. Hoff, elevated white cell count, blood in urine, enlarged/hardened prostate, probable cancer: more tests. Half day Bloomington, half Bedford. Lesa took boys to swim lessons. Played Scrabble with Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – July 29, 2019
item.description: Daycare, Lesa PTO, split time between Bloomington/Bedford. Chickens survived past 24 hrs. Barely time for supper. Lesa took Ashley to Amanda’s, went to Skateland with Girl Scouts, late when I picked her up. I took boys to swim lessons, Dillan stayed home with Lesa, Dillan a pill.

item.title: Status Update – July 28, 2019
item.description: Caught raccoon in live trap, released in Hoosier going to church. Talked to Ken and Kurtis about kids being baptized. Resumed work on run/coop: finished fence, replaced door, fixed nesting box, Lesa covered run with deer netting, finished at 6p. Ate at Asian Pearl. Twister on TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 27, 2019
item.description: Slept in tiny bit. Planned on Jackson Co. Fair, Ashley’s rash bad, called/took her to doctor instead. Something ate Miss Guinea, damaged another hen so bad I had to kill her. Spent all morning rebuilding run. Jiffy Treat, Rural King, Casa Brava. Worked until dark on run. Kids TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 26, 2019
item.description: Took shower, found kids passed out on couch! Lost truck key. Lesa worked, grocery shopped. Got off early, bought Interstate battery, keys made at Lowe’s. Advanced Auto told me they had alternator, liars; Auto Zone had one. Bruce requested game night. Installed alternator/battery.

item.title: Status Update – July 25, 2019
item.description: Daycare, kids swam at Jessica’s. Ashley’s face healing, looks bad, going to peel, hope it doesn’t scar. Worked full day in Bloomington. Lesa took boys to swim lessons, I watched big kids. Dillan went to Gabe’s, he wasn’t home. Kids played Wii, let them watch Home Alone, up later.

item.title: Status Update – July 24, 2019
item.description: Late to daycare/work. Kids thought they’d go swimming, didn’t. SAIC all day. Got kids, Dollar General, Casey’s, home. Lesa in a mood, we walked softly. Dillan went to Gabe’s, I took boys to swim lessons, Ashley went with, Bruce moved to lower skill group, Lesa got her quiet time.

item.title: Status Update – July 23, 2019
item.description: Kids at daycare, pool at Jessica’s. Worked in Bloomington, then SAIC in Bedford to conduct CBT meeting. Picked up kids on late side, Lesa had supper ready. She took two excited boys to their swimming lessons and I took Dillan and Ashley to Bloomfield Pool for C3 Youth Pool Party.

item.title: Status Update – July 22, 2019
item.description: Dillan and Bruce yearly physical, they’re good. Ashley helped wash dogs Sunday, probable allergic reaction to dog shampoo, face and everywhere covered in rash, got bad overnight, doctor checked her too, Prednisone. Boys’ first night of swim lessons, Dwyane Level 4, Bruce Level 2?

item.title: Status Update – July 21, 2019
item.description: Skipped church, slept until 8, kids 10. Called to make Dillan come home after lunch. Kids played inside/out, lots of fighting, made tent in Ashley’s room. Emma’s birthday swim party at John Lowery, kids had fun: rock wall, slide, diving boards; cut short by storm. Nice cool down!

item.title: Status Update – July 20, 2019
item.description: Slept in! Trash/recyclables, Ashley helped, Dillan/Bruce not so much. Dillan went to Gabe’s for cookout, spending night. Rest of us pool, boys/me skinny dipped after girls left. Went to Starlite Drive-In, Lion King & Toy Story 4, truck battery died, needed jump at 2am, adventure!

item.title: Status Update – July 19, 2019
item.description: Daycare/work. Off at 2p, headed to Hilltop Camp, almost in wreck outside Nashville, arrived early. Ashley tired to point of sick, both wanted to go home. Lesa grocery shopped, picked up boys. Pizza. Batman. Stories about camp – they had great time! Ashley says she wants baptized.

item.title: Status Update – July 18, 2019
item.description: Daycare and work, I worked at SAIC all day. Heat index 107°F, kids stayed indoors, frozen water bottles for rabbits, A/C for us. Dwyane was good, Bruce caused trouble like usual. Lesa bought original 1960’s Batman series on DVD so we watched several episodes, POW! Bobcat in area.

item.title: Status Update – July 17, 2019
item.description: Lesa and Dwyane’s birthday! Dwyane 7, Lesa add 50. Lesa PTO, I worked, daycare. Lesa cleaned house, prepped for birthday party, I had to work until 6pm! Paul and Andrea came over, ate dinner, gave birthday boy and girl gifts, visited awhile and went home, it was nice. Watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 16, 2019
item.description: Work/daycare, boys didn’t go anywhere. Worked late, gave them couple extra pieces of candy. Planned on going to fair, rained, killed other outdoor options as well. Thought about going to a movie, didn’t see any worthwhile. Played Sorry and Uno, boys had a blast kicking our butts!

item.title: Status Update – July 15, 2019
item.description: Different not having Dillan and Ashley around. Took boys to daycare, fair going on, no pool trip. SAIC, insecure about job. Boys played fairly well together, Bruce still a bit of a pill. Let them stay up later than usual to watch TV. I’m either really tired or eyes are going bad.

item.title: Status Update – July 14, 2019
item.description: I took kids to church while Lesa went to Walmart and packed kids for camp. Anonymous $500, Ella gave us clothes, lady from parenting class gave us free clothes from her yard sale. Took Dillan and Ashley to Hilltop Camp, got them checked in okay. Boys and us went to Golden Corral.

item.title: Status Update – July 13, 2019
item.description: Kids woke me early, felt crappy rest of day. Dillan went to Gabe’s, Gabe came here. Lesa took Ashley to Scout Fitness Event at Thornton Park. Walmart for Hilltop Camp supplies, was going to go to Asian Pearl but kids so out of control we came straight home instead. Early bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – July 12, 2019
item.description: TGIF! Started day yelling at kids, took them to daycare, went to work. Kids went swimming at Jessica’s. Dillan lost glasses, found them. Got kids home, yelling resumed. They played outside, not long enough. Pizza, and more yelling. Watched Antman. Bedtime, more yelling, long day!

item.title: Status Update – July 11, 2019
item.description: Daycare/work. Ashley went to Jellystone Park with Girl Scouts. Boys didn’t go swimming, expected them to go to Mitchell Pool. Thought about 2nd look at modular, opted to pursue stick built. Kids unmanageable, sent them outside, they played on swing, Dillan and Bruce ramped bikes.

item.title: Status Update – July 10, 2019
item.description: Daycare and work. Lesa picked up boys, I picked up Ashley from Emma’s. She obviously had fun, was extremely tired, a total wreck. When she got home she tried to crash, made her take shower, opted to skip dinner, went to bed. Boys played, Dillan followed me on bike as I cut grass.

item.title: Status Update – July 9, 2019
item.description: Daycare and Mitchell Pool, Dillan accidentally squirted some boys, they retaliated, kids all up in arms over it. Lesa picked up kids, I had doctor appointment. Dillan had Boy Scout meeting, they retired a flag. Ashley spending night at Emma’s, called us to say goodnight and pray.

item.title: Status Update – July 8, 2019
item.description: Lesa PTO, took Dillan to dentist. No cavities either. Rest of kids went to daycare, Dillan joined them, they went to Jessica’s and swam. Logan Rogers picked on Ashley, Dwyane stuck up for her, good for him. Ate on the deck, nice. Helped Ashley clean rabbit hutch. Kids played, TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 7, 2019
item.description: Breakfast, packed up, checked out, headed home. Kids had good time, drove us crazy, threatened to never go again, kids apologized best they knew how, forgiven. Everyone glad to be home, dogs happy too. Kids played inside and out. Dillan went to swim party at youth group. Showers!

item.title: Status Update – July 6, 2019
item.description: Up at day break ready for day chock-full of activity. Breakfast. Crafts: yarn butterflies, tie dye shirts. Dillan and Ashley climbed huge rock wall, exited via zip line! We all canoed. Lunch. Archery. Pool, storm, supper, pool, storm. Kids had total blast! Kids slept much better.

item.title: Status Update – July 5, 2019
item.description: Lesa PTO, I worked from home kind of. Kept kids with us – total butts. Lesa grocery shopped for supplies. Packed for Camp Na Wa Kwa, left mid-afternoon, got to camp right at check-in. Hot in the yurt! Supper, then swimming. Camp fire, hot dogs, s’mores. Kids had trouble sleeping.

item.title: Status Update – July 4, 2019
item.description: July 4th! No work or daycare. Lazy morning. Bought crap ton of fireworks from Celebrations Fireworks in Mitchell. Rural King, bought rabbit fencing for exercise area, water pans, tarp for shade. Watched Epic DVD. Fireworks, kids had a blast – even Bruce, they loved the sparklers.

item.title: Status Update – July 3, 2019
item.description: Daycare/work. Worked over so Lesa picked up kids, got text basically saying kids should die. Home in time to eat with family, seemed like Lesa and kids getting along better. Got really dark out, started storming hard, so much for Solsberry fireworks. Watched Nanny McPhee Returns.

item.title: Status Update – July 2, 2019
item.description: Kids went to daycare and swimming at Mitchell Pool, Lesa worked at IU, I worked at North and East Gates. Kids this side of burnt, very tired, acted crazy. Dillan had Scouts but we decided it best to just stay home and chill. Took showers, watched American Ninja, into bed on time.

item.title: Status Update – July 1, 2019
item.description: Dillan is 10! Daycare, Bloomington/SAIC, Lesa PTO. Lesa took Bruce to doctor for his face: he’s been scratching bug bites; took Dillan to have frames fitted; dropped at Jessica’s – kids were swimming there, got tired, burned. Kids tourney game, lost first round 14-4, season over.

item.title: Status Update – June 30, 2019
item.description: Church early to help set up for church BBQ lunch, Ashley went with. New minister preached, voted in. Paul and Andrea got Dillan a Nerf gun for his birthday. Walmart to let Dillan pick out a new bike. Kids swam. Dillan went to Gabe’s, came back home with him. Stormed. Toy Story 2.

item.title: Status Update – June 29, 2019
item.description: I fetched Dillan from Boy Scout Camp, Lesa took Ashley to piano lesson. Dillan glad to be home, took hot shower. All kids had ballgames at noon, both won, got trophies. Swam, even Lesa. Limestone Festival Parade, Dillan with Boy Scouts, boys with Cub. McAlister’s Deli for dinner.

item.title: Status Update – June 28, 2019
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Kids went to daycare and Jessica’s to swim. Lesa and I worked, she went grocery shopping, beat me and the kids home, I worked over to make up yesterday’s time. Set up and filled the pool, water was very cold, still felt good! Kids watched Battle Bots until bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – June 27, 2019
item.description: Daycare, we both worked. Hot outside, kids went to Mitchell Pool, got back at 4:15p. Lesa and I took off early, picked up kids, headed to Camp Maumee for Parent Night. Dillan doing good, really happy to see Lesa, rest of us not so much. Pizza. Dillan showed us around, he’s happy.

item.title: Status Update – June 26, 2019
item.description: Kids at daycare. Worked in Bloomington. Lesa worked also, felt better. Kids played outside just a few minutes, so hot daycare brought them back in, gave them pop-cycles. Cut grass. Bruce got stung by a wasp on his upper lip, screamed bloody murder, hurt. Watched TV rest of night.

item.title: Status Update – June 25, 2019
item.description: Kids daycare, Mitchell Pool, all went well. Lesa sick now, still worked. I’m still sick but feel like I’m getting better, did 9 hours at SAIC. Picked up kids, rushed home, scarfed supper, took kids to their ballgame, they suck, Lesa stayed home and rested. American Ninja Warrior.

item.title: Status Update – June 24, 2019
item.description: Peace and quiet in house, everyone’s noticed: Dillan at camp. Storming, headed straight toward him, Lesa worried he’s in a tent. Lesa took kids to dentist, Ashley having issues around spacer but not to worry yet, all need to brush better, thankfully no cavities. Moana before bed.

item.title: Status Update – June 23, 2019
item.description: No church, lazy morning, early lunch. Loaded Dillan’s gear, drove to Camp Maumee, waited an hour for Scout Leader Albert Cross, another hour while camps got switched. Stormed, rushed gear to shelter, said goodbye, left. Beauty and the Beast, Incredibles. Good night / luck Dillan!

item.title: Status Update – June 22, 2019
item.description: Ashley piano lesson. Stormed, forfeited going to Splash-O-Ree. Wound up packing Dillan for Boy Scout Camp, went to Walmart and Rural King for stuff he didn’t have. Asian Pearl. Kids acted crazy entire day. Showers for all, watched TV, tried to mellow kids out for bedtime, failed.

item.title: Status Update – June 21, 2019
item.description: Daycare, break in rain, swam at Jessica’s. Boys crazy: up slide backwards, stacked riding toys, crashed Wriggly, busted his face. Ashley crazy too: four-finger scratched Elahdy’s back, smarted off to Jessica. None listened. All kids got it once home! Stormed, ballgames cancelled.

item.title: Status Update – June 20, 2019
item.description: Kids daycare, Lesa IU, me SAIC. After work picked up Lesa and kids and we went to closing night of VBS. Pizza! Kids got faces painted: boys Killer Clowns, Ashley Evil Rabbit. Balloons animals, Ashley rabbit of course, in the end they all had swords hitting each other. Still sick.

item.title: Status Update – June 19, 2019
item.description: Sick. Took kids to daycare, came home, slept all day! Lesa worked from home. My Father’s Day gift arrived, really nice deck table and chairs, going to get a lot of use out of them if it quits raining! SIRA for lung CT scan, Lesa picked up kids. She drove them to VBS, I picked up.

item.title: Status Update – June 18, 2019
item.description: Daycare, work. Stormed. Picked kids up, roads really bad. Kids total pills, super whiney, butts to us / each other. Kids ballgame canceled, VBS an option, we kept them home. Opted not to take Dillan to Scouts either. Plugged in Avengers DVD, bed after. They needed the extra rest!

item.title: Status Update – June 17, 2019
item.description: Big fight with Ashley, can’t undo words. Kids at daycare. Rained all day. Picked up kids, Lesa had dinner ready and waiting so kids could go to VBS. Bruce and Ashley acted out, wouldn’t listen, got their attention by threatening VBS, fireworks and tears! Relented. Met Emma there.

item.title: Status Update – June 16, 2019
item.description: Father’s Day. Church, Jr Church. Stormed all morning, roads flooded. Kids butts again, felt like all I did was yell, heard I’m bored multiple times! Helped Ashley clean hutch, Dillan build solar-powered robot. Lesa fixed venison dinner. Took kids to VBS, had lots of fun, stormed.

item.title: Status Update – June 15, 2019
item.description: Ashley piano lesson. Kids total butts to us/each other. I played Yahtzee with Ashley. Jay C for VBS supplies. Casa Bravo for Father’s Day, had awesome salmon plate. Jiffy Treat. Skipped drive-in 2nd week, stormed, tornado touchdown in Monroe Co. Watched Ralph Breaks the Internet.

item.title: Status Update – June 14, 2019
item.description: Boys at daycare, Ashley 2nd day cheerleader clinic; learned cheers, pyramid, basket toss; said it was fun but scary; daycare when over. Daycare took kids to park. I picked them up, Lesa grocery shopped. Took Dillan early for baseball picture; Lesa, kids joined later for ballgame.

item.title: Status Update – June 13, 2019
item.description: Took boys to daycare, Ashley to Jessica’s, she drove her to cheer clinic at BNL. Lesa worked from home, planned on driving her. No swimming, too cold. Jessica asked if Ashley could spend night with Elahdy, we said yes. Lesa picked up boys, they played outside. Dwyane helped cook.

item.title: Status Update – June 12, 2019
item.description: Non-event day at daycare. I worked out, got medicine sick from new script, felt like crap most of the day. Last minute transportation for Ashley’s cheerleading clinic tomorrow. We wouldn’t let the kids have any TV time tonight, they watched TV all day at daycare. Showers for all.

item.title: Status Update – June 11, 2019
item.description: Kids went to Mitchell Pool, Bruce told me he remembers how to swim, he went off high dive couple of times. Worked half day Bloomington, half day Bedford. Kids had a ballgame, Ashley played pitcher position, kids almost won. Dillan got stung by wasp at playground. CVS for my meds.

item.title: Status Update – June 10, 2019
item.description: Daycare for kids. Delivered partition resize procedure to California, started delivery of Texas maps. Dr. Thompson called, elevated PSA level of 4.1 ng/mL: higher than normal, possible prostate cancer, referred to a specialist. Kids had a ballgame, photo night. Bruce slammed one!

item.title: Status Update – June 9, 2019
item.description: Lead in back, roaming security, Emma went to church with us, I think she had good time, dropped her off on our way home. Ashley worn out, girls up until 1:00am. Tried to nap, got 30-45 minutes in. Rainy afternoon, stormy evening. TV out, Youth Group canceled. Kids in bed on time!

item.title: Status Update – June 8, 2019
item.description: Took Ashley to piano lesson, we cleaned deck and house while Lesa got cookout supplies. Went to Western Skateland to roller skate, kids had a blast, Lesa skated too. Ken and Cassie Tussey came over for cook out, Emma spending night with Ashley, Emma’s first sleepover. A good day.

item.title: Status Update – June 7, 2019
item.description: Daycare. Supposed to leave early, worked late instead. Walking again, not worried my heart will blow up. Opted to skip Starlight Drive-In to see Secret Life of Pets 2. Dillan had ballgame, got a good hit, tagged on 2nd; teammate bullied him, Dillan got even, unknown price to pay.

item.title: Status Update – June 6, 2019
item.description: Daycare, kids went swimming. Finally had my physical, sounds like my issue might be MS related and need to lose weight. Lesa found used pull-ups Bruce hid in his toy box, don’t know what to say. Rabbits doing good, chicken issues. Ashley nervous about sleepover, cleaned her room.

item.title: Status Update – June 5, 2019
item.description: Rained, kids at daycare. SAIC, didn’t feel well. Skipped Ashley’s GS concert – couldn’t get off early, didn’t want to drive, thunderstorms at outdoor venue. Meet and greet prospective minister at C3, didn’t stay for dinner – no place for kids – El Ranchero in Bloomington instead.

item.title: Status Update – June 4, 2019
item.description: Daycare, Bruce peed/pooped pants, tried to hold it, stayed on playground, didn’t make it, not allowed to go swimming today, rest got to go. SAIC again, tomorrow too. Finally able to cut grass. Lesa took Dillan to Boy Scouts so I could finish. I swear rabbits are twice their size!

item.title: Status Update – June 3, 2019
item.description: Took kids to daycare, thought they’d go swimming, they didn’t. Worked at SAIC. Ashley’s rabbits doing good, now all the boys want rabbits too. Wanted to cut grass, wound up doing other stuff instead. Told Dillan I feel so tired I didn’t care if I ever woke up again, he hugged me.

item.title: Status Update – June 2, 2019
item.description: Family Sunday, Dillan at Youth House. Lowe’s for pool hose, potting soil. Pool not level enough. Rural King for water bottles, feeders, storage bins, rabbit food. Picked up rabbits on way home (plus another hen). Ashley named rabbits Blackie and Oreo, both female. One happy girl!

item.title: Status Update – June 1, 2019
item.description: Took Ashley to piano lesson. Worked on rabbit hutch morning to night, finally finished after dinner except for sheet of tin on roof; sore hands and back, bug bites everywhere! Tried to set up a new pool, need to get hose adapter. Dillan hung with Gabriel. Kids did lots of chores.

item.title: Status Update – May 31, 2019
item.description: Daycare, swimming at Mitchell Pool; Ashley fell, scrapped back, stubbed big toe; Bruce said he almost drowned, lifeguard and Dillan helped him; all kids got too much sun. Lesa got groceries, Papa John’s pizza. Went to kids game, they lost. Dillan, Ashley watched Close Encounters.

item.title: Status Update – May 30, 2019
item.description: Lesa went back to work after 2 weeks off, must have been rough. I took kids to daycare, it stormed so no swimming trip. Worked at SAIC all day. Picked up kids, rushed home, Lesa had sandwiches made, off to kids’ ballgame, their team almost won. Kids were total pills, even Ashley!

item.title: Status Update – May 29, 2019
item.description: We took kids to bus stop again, Bruce stayed with us. Dwyane’s Honors Program, then waited around for Dillan and Ashley’s Honors Program. We’re proud of all the kids! Dillan passed! All kids went home with Lesa. School’s out for summer. I worked late again. More lumber for hutch.

item.title: Status Update – May 28, 2019
item.description: Lesa and I took kids to bus stop. Went to Bruce’s Kindergarten Graduation, cupcakes/punch after, pictures with Mrs Dillman and Mr Hudson, glad he made it, proud of him, went home with Lesa. Worked late, made up time, Lesa got other kids from daycare. Dillan had Boy Scout meeting.

item.title: Status Update – May 27, 2019
item.description: Went to see about house plans, think we’ll build. Stopped at Ken and Cassie Tussey’s, invited Emma to spend night in a couple of weeks, hay for rabbits. Worked on hutch with Ashley, didn’t finish. Kids played on trampoline at Lexi’s. Took kids to ride bikes in school parking lot.

item.title: Status Update – May 26, 2019
item.description: Serving Deacon, honored graduates including Bruce (graduated kindergarten). Ashley left with Jennifer Meese to sew purses. Taco Bell. Took communion to shut-ins. Great Clips for boys’ haircuts. Lowe’s again, hutch supplies. Picked up Ashley. Finished bunk bed stairs. Late to bed.

item.title: Status Update – May 25, 2019
item.description: Kids woke us early. Took Ashley to piano lesson. Called on house, no reply. Lesa took Dillan to Oolitic VFW to places flags on graves for Memorial Day, I picked him up. Ashley and me went to Lowe’s to get lumber. Took Dillan to practice. Callback on house, meet Monday. Baths, TV.

item.title: Status Update – May 24, 2019
item.description: Friday! Bus early, so were we. Lesa attended Dwyane’s class picnic, they had good time. Off by 2:30p, still a long day, Got kids. Pizza! Dillan had double header, won first game, should’ve won second; Dillan, Ashley, myself at ballpark 3½ hours; Lesa and boys left after 1st game.

item.title: Status Update – May 23, 2019
item.description: Lesa PTO. Kids rode bus, Dwyane forgot backpack, I wouldn’t go get it. Dillan did tie-dye T-shirt at school. Rained hard in morning, ball field soaked, kids’ game canceled. Golden Corral, Dillan gorged himself. Annual Williams Bridge tradition to celebrate 2 years since adoption.

item.title: Status Update – May 22, 2019
item.description: Ashley’s birthday, 9 years old! Drove kids to school after listening to Spirit 95 birthday announcement on radio. Day started out raining, stopped in time for Dillan’s class picnic at park. Got kids. Had Ashley’s party, she got what she asked for: a Baby Born that pees and poops.

item.title: Status Update – May 21, 2019
item.description: Missed bus again, yelled at kids, they weren’t ready: Dwyane spent 15 minutes looking for coat, Bruce 10 looking for shoes, no one brushed teeth. Lesa took kids to ballgame, I took Dillan to his first Boy Scout meeting. Lesa breakdown over Ashley (me?), feels like failure, cried.

item.title: Status Update – May 20, 2019
item.description: Lesa taking PTO all week. I got kids up, ready for school, out the door, missed bus by 30 seconds, took to school. Lesa went to park for Bruce’s Class Picnic, all the older kids had their Game Day. Worked ½ day at Scientia, ½ day at SAIC. Kid team had ballgame, smoked other team!

item.title: Status Update – May 19, 2019
item.description: Skipped church, everyone tired. Ashley’s left nipple hurts, bump, may be growing breasts. Lesa went to store early morning to get supplies for Crossover. Bruce graduated Lion to Tiger, Dwyane Tiger to Wolf. Dillan earned Arrow of Light, crossed over from Cub Scouts to Boy Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – May 18, 2019
item.description: Ashley piano lesson at 9a. Got Lesa, rest of kids at 10a, Thorne Homes for drawings at 10:30a. McDonald’s at 11a. Dropped kids off at Osterbrook’s by 12p. Went to Sarah’s wedding in Rushville at 3p. Got kids at 7:30p, had fun, asked to stay longer. Home, showers, bed by 9p. Whew!

item.title: Status Update – May 17, 2019
item.description: Hornet 5K: Dillan 1st in class, 7th overall; Ashley cramped, last in class; Dwyane 3rd in class; Bruce 1st in class, kindergartners ran 1 mile, still. Off by 2, got kids, cut grass. Lesa groceries. Dillan’s team lost. Got hutch, Ashley picked rabbits; more hens, lost 4 in 2 days.

item.title: Status Update – May 16, 2019
item.description: Bruce is six today! Hard to believe! Kids won’t stop growing! Lesa and I feel blessed even though they can drive us crazy. Had our usual private party, got a set of laser guns, started raining so couldn’t play outside very long. Ice cream and cookie cake he asked for, he’s happy.

item.title: Status Update – May 15, 2019
item.description: Our 37th Anniversary, took Lesa to Taste of India for lunch, had nice time. Busy at work, got off late, late getting kids. Raining, kids stuck inside. They were tired, went to bed late last night, got up early this morning: cranky, whiny, mouthy, they lost their minds. Go to bed!

item.title: Status Update – May 14, 2019
item.description: Left work at 4p, rushed to get kids, Lesa rushed to fix supper, first baseball games and photos. Ball field by 6p, no photos, rescheduled. Kids played on playground, Dillan practiced, I rushed to Springville, paid for Dillan’s Scout Camp. Kids and Dillan both lost their 7p games.

item.title: Status Update – May 13, 2019
item.description: Wanted to sleep in, didn’t happen. Long work day. Amanda Goen picked up Ashley from daycare, took her to Girl Scout Bridge Ceremony. Lesa picked up boys, took them home. I picked up Ashley after her event. Lesa took boys to Scouts, last meeting for season. Ashley practiced piano.

item.title: Status Update – May 12, 2019
item.description: Church. Mother’s Day, Lesa loved her cards, gifts. Ashley, Bruce and I made pancakes for lunch, piggy pancakes for kids. Took Lesa to Lowe’s, got potting/top soil and pots to plant flowers. Cooked salmon, asparagus, yellow rice and Oliver’s Soft White for supper. Kids cleaned up.

item.title: Status Update – May 11, 2019
item.description: Hauled trash, Ashley helped, boys off playing. Lesa and Ashley went to a Tea Party at church, they got along, had reasonably good time. Took boys to baseball practice. Walmart and Kay’s for Mother’s Day cards and gifts. Orange Leaf and grocery store. Dillan’s practice rained out.

item.title: Status Update – May 10, 2019
item.description: Lesa PTO. Worked full day. Dwyane went to Karst Farm Park in Bloomington for class picnic and field trip, Ashley also took field trip to Marengo Cave, they both had fun. Lesa went to Muffins with Mom with Bruce’s kindergarten class, left with her. Thorne did property walk-around.

item.title: Status Update – May 9, 2019
item.description: Short work day, left at noon. Bruce had Kindergarten Track and Field Day, left with me. Picked up other kids as well. Took Ashley to cheerleader tryouts. Took Dillan to baseball practice. Checked standings at school, Ashley made team: she’s a cheerleader, she couldn’t be happier!

item.title: Status Update – May 8, 2019
item.description: Normal day. Picked up kids, Lesa, Marco’s pizza. Ate at Wilson Park, noticed pregnant woman having trouble, asked if okay, offered her pizza, seemed okay when we left. Rural King: chicken food, rabbit supplies. Dunham’s: new glove, bat, trousers for Dillan. Walmart: milk, cleats.

item.title: Status Update – May 7, 2019
item.description: Work and school. Lesa got off work early, picked up Ashley from school and took her to cheerleading clinic and then picked up boys from daycare. I worked over a bit and then picked up Ashley, she was excited but sore from doing cheers, has a list of things for Thursday’s tryouts.

item.title: Status Update – May 6, 2019
item.description: Off early, took Ashley to cheerleader clinic at Bedford Middle School. Picked up boys from daycare, went to Wilson Park. Took everyone but Bruce to Scouts, was throwing a fit, Lesa wound up taking him later. Dillan tied knots, Bruce made a car, rest of us picked up trash in park.

item.title: Status Update – May 5, 2019
item.description: Family Sunday, feels weird not teaching, security deacon. Huge blow-up over Lesa and Ashley fighting. Took Dillan to Spring Mill for Webelos hike, we all went, Webelos hiked easy Trail 7, we hiked rugged Trail 4 to Donaldson Cave. KFC. Dillan baseball practice, Ashley went along.

item.title: Status Update – May 4, 2019
item.description: Up before kids even. Met contractor, looked at property, discussed house plans, will create estimate. Hauled huge load of trash. Thorne’s, dropped off plans, will create estimate as well. All practices rained out. Arby’s. Walmart, shoes all around. Kids played outside, got muddy.

item.title: Status Update – May 3, 2019
item.description: Long week, glad day is over. Started out raining, worried about Ashley’s class picnic getting canceled; she went, played with friends. Daycare said boys better behaved then last couple of days. Dillan rode dirt bike, all kids played outside. Lesa and I played Sorry with big kids.

item.title: Status Update – May 2, 2019
item.description: Lesa wants to make offer on house, I don’t, so we won’t. Bruce took field trip to quarry, he had fun. All baseball practices rained out. Scouts canceled, Amanda in hospital, pregnancy complications, Alisha Goodwine took over, Scouts after all, Lesa took her and boys, boys played.

item.title: Status Update – May 1, 2019
item.description: Ashley took camping equipment to decorate classroom. I worked ½ day, took Ashley to dentist for grinding teeth. While at school saw Bruce in Mr Hudson’s office with Grady, exposed themselves. Paid property taxes. Picked up boys from school. Walk-through, Lesa interested, I’m not.

item.title: Status Update – April 30, 2019
item.description: Long workday, maps, left late. Still sick. Lesa saw a house, doing walk-through tomorrow, will probably pass. Got kids, Ashley brought home a sycamore tree, Bruce got his kite for getting all of his tasks complete. Signed Dillan up for Boy Scout Camp. Took Ashley to piano lesson.

item.title: Status Update – April 29, 2019
item.description: Monday, seemed like slowest workday ever? Still sick, slightly better. Picked up kids like always. Daycare made Bruce write “I will not say the F word.” over and over on a sheet of paper. Took everyone to Scouts, Pack night, lots of awards for everyone, almost over for year. Bed!

item.title: Status Update – April 28, 2019
item.description: Skipped church. Lowe’s for OTR microwave. Built chicken carrier. Dillan had baseball practice, took Ashley, 2 hours long! Got hens from Nicole Rogers; made deal for baby rabbits, hutch for Ashley; pick up in 5 weeks. Installed microwave. Dillan ran away for 15 minutes, mad at me.

item.title: Status Update – April 27, 2019
item.description: Went to Maumee, set up camp, kids played, ate, hot chocolate, S’mores, etc. Got super cold, we froze even though we prepared. Warm fire, coffee, more hot chocolate, breakfast, packed camp, went home. Coach pitch team able to practice, Dillan rained out. Asian Pearl. Kids had fun!

item.title: Status Update – April 26, 2019
item.description: It’s official, we’re sick. Worked half day, went to Donuts with Dad, hung out with Bruce at home. Lesa picked up other kids after work. Loaded truck so I can take kids camping, Lesa staying home. Dillan fell off bunk, hurt his neck, still wants to camp. Rain stopped, we’re going!

item.title: Status Update – April 25, 2019
item.description: Decent workday. Ashley ILEARN test again, Bruce climbed bathroom stalls, missed recess for second day. Lesa signed up big kids for Hilltop Camp. Ashley didn’t have Scouts because of leader meeting, Dillan didn’t have baseball practice because of rain. Lesa and I are getting sick.

item.title: Status Update – April 24, 2019
item.description: Rained off-and-on all day. Day 2 of ILEARN. Bruce humped kid in front of teacher, got in trouble, said f*ck, sat out recess with teacher, in trouble once home. Worked over a little, got kids, nothing planned for tonight. Got text, worked some. Kids played in house, big kid baths.

item.title: Status Update – April 21, 2019
item.description: Overslept for Deacon’s Breakfast, served communion, locked up. Easter Bunny came, kids had fun, they played inside / out, mostly out. Made Dillan take practice Pearson test. Lesa dropped off overdue library books, read Dwyane’s book: Girl in the Locked Room. Ashley triggered bad!

item.title: Status Update – April 20, 2019
item.description: Got Bruce’s backpack, good grades also, Dillan our only worry. Drove to Fortville for annual Dellinger Dinner and Easter Egg Hunt, kids had lots of fun even though it rained all day. Went to my parents for Easter Dinner, everyone snacked since we just ate. Looked at three houses.

item.title: Status Update – April 19, 2019
item.description: Friday, everyone’s glad it’s end of week. Good Friday, didn’t go anywhere. Got report cards, Ashley got a B, shes’s disappointed in herself. Dwyane matched Ashley’s grades. Dillan Din Math, F in Reading, tried to hide it from us. Bruce left backpack at daycare so not sure. Pizza.

item.title: Status Update – April 18, 2019
item.description: Worked late. I was going to get Dillan and Ashley, take Ashley to doctor’s for cheer leading physical, then Scouts, take Dillan to baseball. Rained, so just Ashley, Lesa got boys. Waited forever at doctor. Snacks for Scouts, saw Mrs. Davis. Dropped Ashley off, Lesa picked her up.

item.title: Status Update – April 17, 2019
item.description: Ashley took field trip to fairgrounds for agriculture. Lesa spotted house, looked good, left early, picked up kids and Lesa, north of Bloomington, walk-through: too much money, poor shape, still nice. Dinner at Culver’s, ice cream of course. Neck, shoulder been tingling for days?

item.title: Status Update – April 16, 2019
item.description: Lead computer-based training meeting at SAIC. Signed Dwyane and Bruce up for swim lessons. Picked up Bruce’s weather artwork from Times-Mail. Got kids, dropped boys at home with Lesa. Took Ashley to HA Career Fair, didn’t place, no matter, so very proud of her! Piano lesson. Bed!

item.title: Status Update – April 15, 2019
item.description: Arrived same time as bus, quick kisses, kids ran. Work okay – it’s work. Picked up kids. Lesa took all boys to Bedford Police Station for Scouts, said Dillan helped keep other boys in line. Ashley and me finished her HA project, did several dry runs, ready as she’ll ever be. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 14, 2019
item.description: Skipped church, slept in, Dillan made me breakfast, Ashley coffee. Weather turned cold, rained all day, kids still went outside a few times. Ashley and I worked on HA project. We read to them. Boys played cars together. Tablet time. Blanket fort. Board games. Started PAVA letter.

item.title: Status Update – April 13, 2019
item.description: Drafted floor plan until 4:30a, tired. Amanda drove Ashley to Greenfield for WOW Adventure, she had fun, I didn’t have to chaperone. Took Dillan to first ball practice of season, Lesa took Dwyane and Bruce to theirs. Went to Walmart, Jiffy Treat, Fayetteville Baptist Bean Supper.

item.title: Status Update – April 12, 2019
item.description: Glad it’s Friday! Got off a bit late, picked up kids. Looked at home in Monroe Co. Kids liked, I didn’t, not sure about Lesa. Kids played on school playground while waiting on Springville Store pizza. Talked to Dillan about Mrs Harp’s note: failing Math/Reading. Watched Coco DVD.

item.title: Status Update – April 11, 2019
item.description: Lesa left at 3, picked up kids. I left at 3, picked up Bible I won on Spirit 95. School Literacy Night, kids wrote books: Bruce – cheetahs; Dwyane – pigeons; Ashley – her and her friends; Dillan – important things. Lexi, Kash visited. Ashley Scouts, cyber-security in Bloomington.

item.title: Status Update – April 10, 2019
item.description: School, work, nothing special. Kids played outside a lot. Lesa found house she wanted to do walk-through on, went after dinner, I think we’ll pass on it. Kids wanted it of course until they found out they wouldn’t be going to Springville where their friends are. Showers, bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – April 9, 2019
item.description: Q and U got married at school, Bruce musician in wedding, volunteered his extra toy guitar to classmate, appears to have enjoyed himself. Worked in Bloomington, brought work home. Ashley piano lesson; has to practice lines/spaces; C, G, & F chords. Girls’ matching shirts arrived.

item.title: Status Update – April 8, 2019
item.description: Drove kids to school, returned 5k permission slips. Worked in Bloomington, then Bedford. Picked up kids and Lesa, we headed to BNL for Art Fair. Dillan had ceramic dream catcher and Dwyane a clay pinch pot. Awesome job boys! Bob Evans dinner, Bruce finally got his Piggy Pancakes!

item.title: Status Update – April 7, 2019
item.description: Church, Family Sunday. The Meeses took Ashley to Taco Bell, then their house where Jennifer taught Ashley to use a sewing machine, she did awesome, sewed blanket for her dolls but had us save it for when she’s older. Dillan played at Gabe’s all afternoon, boys played outside too.

item.title: Status Update – April 6, 2019
item.description: Up by 7a, boys awake but quiet. Took Dillan to Merit Badge Fair at BNL from 8a-3p, earned two pins and a patch. Took Ashley to My Guy and Me Dance & Safari Hunt from 6p-9p, we had a blast. Ten hours of one-on-one with two oldest, poor Lesa stuck watching three kids all day/night.

item.title: Status Update – April 5, 2019
item.description: Everyone tired. Worked late. Annetta made Dillan write page of: I will lose my bad attitude; Bruce write page of: I will keep hands to myself; and Dwyane draw: a happy picture. Lesa unloading groceries when we got home, we helped her. Pizza and Turbo movie. Dillan went to Gabe’s.

item.title: Status Update – April 4, 2019
item.description: Work never-ending, Signed tax returns with H&R Block, getting $14,191 refund! Kids had Safe Touch thing at school. Scouts cancel, Amanda fell down stairs, having baby checked out. Went to Buffalo Wild Wings for dinner, four adult meals, hefty bill. Walmart for recycle containers.

item.title: Status Update – April 3, 2019
item.description: Work slower than yesterday. Dropped off missing tax documents. Brought map work home. Water heater nice. Lesa got mad over Ashley’s short dress, I got mad over way she handled it. Ashley brought home cheerleader application. Dillan didn’t want to do homework. Ashley’s HA project.

item.title: Status Update – April 2, 2019
item.description: Barely caught bus. Work slow, dropped taxes off afterward, Lesa picked up kids. Text message mail server down, didn’t see a problem. Another text, Ashley punched classmate Seth in face, his mom called and complained. New hot water heater installed, here late, Dillan watched them.

item.title: Status Update – April 1, 2019
item.description: Back to school/work. Made appointment with H&R Block. Picked up kids, lots of April Fools jokes. Took all kids to Scouts, Bruce/Lions cleaned park, Ashley helped, playground afterward. Picked up PO Box letter from Daniel, still incarcerated, Lesa and I kind of upset over content.

item.title: Status Update – March 31, 2019
item.description: Church, security deacon, last day of Intentional Parenting. Muddy, cold, kids didn’t want to play outside. Dillan spent afternoon at Gabe’s. Lesa took boys on walk. Ashley and me worked on her HA project. Lesa, myself and kids, in various combinations, played Sorry, Uno, Yahtzee.

item.title: Status Update – March 30, 2019
item.description: Woke late, Ashley poured me coffee! Bedford Library, got books on rabbits and for Ashley’s HA project. Wendy’s. Walmart to get Dillan watch band, battery. Lesa grocery shopped. Rain turned into freezing rain, turned cold. Pancakes. Kids wound tight, stuck inside, TV, board games.

item.title: Status Update – March 29, 2019
item.description: Slept in, packed up, left for home. Subway lunch. Kids tired, Bruce pill entire way home. Dogs happy to see us, us them! Dillan went to Gabe’s right away, rest of kids played outside, temps in 60s. Asian Pearl dinner. After, all kids played outside, together, and had lots of fun!

item.title: Status Update – March 28, 2019
item.description: Up earlier than wanted but that’s okay, got to Ark early. we avoided crowd that came later so we saw exhibits unencumbered, kids rode a camel. Played at Webb Park. Whippy Dippy ice cream. Very long train was cool. Domino’s Pizza delivery. Movies and Uno. Expensive day! Great day!

item.title: Status Update – March 27, 2019
item.description: Slept in, loaded truck, drove to KY for Ark Encounter. Arrived early, checked out town, got settled in, old house, better than hotel. Ate at a Mexican restaurant, got some groceries. Watched Transylvania 3, played Uno. Kids super wound up! Got really mad at Lesa, scared everyone.

item.title: Status Update – March 26, 2019
item.description: Daycare again, so busy I worked over. Lesa left after morning meeting. Picked up kids, filled tank, Dollar General for oil and antifreeze. Lesa cooked venison steaks for dinner, yummy. Cleaned out truck, topped off fluids, ready for tomorrow I hope. Kids excited. Watched some TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 25, 2019
item.description: Took kids to daycare, Lesa and I worked, busy day, went fast, tired, Lesa more tired than me. Picked up kids, Annetta and Jessica both said kids were good. No Scouts. Lesa backed Jeep into electrical box, pulled her off with truck / chains. Played Sorry and Yahtzee, kids up late.

item.title: Status Update – March 24, 2019
item.description: Ashley had bad nightmare. Junior Church, kids liked me there. Rained all day, stormed late evening. Kids played inside. Moved piano into Ashley’s room, cleaned up, rearranged, someone picking up roll top tomorrow. Kids played on Wii. Played Yahtzee and Uno with Dillan and Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – March 23, 2019
item.description: Woke up early to Dillan yelling at Bruce. Clear Creek, looked at manufactured homes, raised prices $50k over last year! Won’t pay that for manufactured, won’t get financing either. Thorne’s a maybe. Lunch at McAlister’s Deli. Kids played outside, Dillan at Gabe’s, walk with Lesa.

item.title: Status Update – March 22, 2019
item.description: I have a cold. Worked in Bloomington, never made it to SAIC. Officially on Spring Break, kids excited to go to Kentucky. Report cards: Ashley and Bruce As; Dwyane As and Bs; Dillan As, Bs, and Cs. Ashley passed iRead, has High Ability opportunity. Awesome! We’re so proud of them!

item.title: Status Update – March 21, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus. Worked in Bloomington until noon, then SAIC, repeating tomorrow. Ashley packed lunch. Picked kids up, dropped Ashley at Amanda’s, Brownies went to Build A Bear, built Brownie bears, she had fun. Lesa handled kids AND homework, I crashed on couch. I’m catching cold?

item.title: Status Update – March 20, 2019
item.description: First day of Spring! Barely made bus, Ashley thinks she did well on iLearn. Kids okay, we’re not: SAIC noise pollution stressing me, feel like puking, go back tomorrow; Lesa sciatic nerve issue with left leg, stressed out. Left work at reasonable time, picked up kids. Watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 19, 2019
item.description: Bruce forgot school backpack. Ashley took iRead-3, thinks she did well, was really nervous prior, iLearn testing tomorrow. Worked all day at SAIC, off late, barely got kids on time, Lesa had dinner waiting. Took Ashley to her piano lesson. Bedtime, Dillan played around per usual.

item.title: Status Update – March 18, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus! Problems at work, off late, barely got kids on time. Lesa had supper waiting, kids gobbled up ham, seconds all around. All went to Scout Pack meeting, Dillan got a pin, kids chowed on snacks. Ashley turned in early, iRead-3 testing tomorrow: rest, breakfast, focus.

item.title: Status Update – March 17, 2019
item.description: Church, backup serving deacon, kids learned story of Shepard and the Lost Sheep, told Kurtis Moffitt we’d attend his Bible Study. Dillan more talkative about SuperStart, I helped him make shelf for Scouts, went to Gabe’s. Kids explored woods with Lesa. Tablets, play, board games.

item.title: Status Update – March 16, 2019
item.description: Slept until 8:30, no riled up boys! Lazy morning. Lesa took kids to get mail, ran into Gabe, so bored he invited other kids over, they played awhile. Planned on Asian Pearl, texted, Dillan getting home too late, settled on KFC. Dillan said he had good time, would go again, a win?

item.title: Status Update – March 15, 2019
item.description: Bruce low-grade fever, felt yucky. School called about Ashley’s rash, worried it’s contagious, Lesa took her to doctor, abrasive dermatitis (dry skin), back to school. Dwyane read to Ashley’s class. C3 picked up Dillan for SuperStart in Cincinnati. Homemade pizza, 101 Dalmatians.

item.title: Status Update – March 14, 2019
item.description: Very warm. Drove kids to school again. Worked morning in Bloomington, afternoon at SAIC, tornado touchdowns in Orleans and Heltonville, lots of down branches/trees, lost power until 10:30p. Ashley made pico de gallo at Scouts, tasty. Ashley has rash on her right cheek, worrisome.

item.title: Status Update – March 13, 2019
item.description: Drove kids to school. Warm day. Leprechaun footprints around Bruce’s trap, left a hat, no Leprechaun. Thought it was Thursday, was going to take Ashley to Scouts. Left earlier than usual to pick up kids and go home. Lesa went to CVS, got Mrs Dillman’s photos, kids played outside.

item.title: Status Update – March 12, 2019
item.description: Walked Bruce into school, talked with Mr Hudson. Worked at SAIC, one minute to spare picking up kids, almost took bad mood and headache out on kids but didn’t. Took Ashley to piano lesson, she took test in her music book, Loretta scored it, gave her a B. Dwyane clipped his nails.

item.title: Status Update – March 11, 2019
item.description: Drove kids to school, Bruce had leprechaun trap. Lesa took PTO, call from Mr Hudson, Bruce pushed girl down on playground, 3 days no recess. Left ½ hour early, got kids, dropped them off except Bruce, we drove to school, had long talk. Ashley practiced piano. Took boys to Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – March 10, 2019
item.description: Church, fill-in minister. Boys played outside, good muddy fun. Ashley on tablet in afternoon (boys got theirs yesterday when she was selling cookies). Dwyane felt sick early evening, seemed okay at bedtime. Helped Bruce make leprechaun trap, he liked; Ashley, Dwyane made one too.

item.title: Status Update – March 9, 2019
item.description: Ashley and me made Lesa breakfast in bed. Registered kids for baseball; CVS for Mrs Dillman’s photos, not ready; Dollar General for art supplies. IGA for last day of cookie sales, Ashley met her goal. Becky babysat kids, brought Maelee, date night at Outback, played Yahtzee, fun.

item.title: Status Update – March 8, 2019
item.description: Pajama day, missed bus, dropped kids off, got call Dwyane forgot backpack, went back, took it to him. Off at 3:30. Lesa off early too, grocery shopping, Rural King. Lesa picked up boys, McDonald’s, Nerf Gun Wars! Boys had great time! I got Ashley, Taco Bell, watched DVD, popcorn.

item.title: Status Update – March 7, 2019
item.description: Early getting ready! Day even slower than yesterday. Still cold, been snowing since mid-afternoon, ground covered. Picked up kids. Marriage Oneness Class over, last one canceled. No Scouts. Ashley a pill, boys super worked up about tomorrow. Homework. Lesa played games with kids.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – March 7, 2019
item.description: Lesa checked on Ashley in the shower. Ashley started singing to Lesa: If I had a million dollars, I’d buy you a new house. If I had a million dollars, I’d buy you a new couch. If I had a million dollars, I’d buy you a new love seat. If I had a million dollars, I’d buy you a new…

item.title: Status Update – March 6, 2019
item.description: Cold, sub-zero wind chills, kids stayed in truck until bus. Day dragged by. Lesa picked up Ashley, took her to Amanda’s, Scout trip, Space Lab in Bloomington. I picked up boys, was watching TV, didn’t notice Lesa picked up Ashley! Quiet evening. Took Dillan with me to get Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – March 5, 2019
item.description: Everyone healthy! Dillan forgot lunch bag, went back, drove kids to school. Dillan field trip to State Capital in Indy, he had fun. Got kids. Took Ashley to piano lesson, stopped at Ken Osterbrook’s, dropped off Dillan’s SuperStart form/money. Lesa showed boys Friday’s Nerf gear!

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – March 5, 2019
item.description: Dwyane: I love Daddy half, Mommy half, and God and Jesus half.

item.title: Status Update – March 4, 2019
item.description: Lesa sick, Ashley not 100%, rest of us okay? Work went fast. Picked up kids. Bruce’s Scout leader sick, Dwyane didn’t want to go, only Dillan went to Scouts, almost didn’t go due to homework, asked to bring hammer, he made a bank. Lesa wrangled other three: popcorn, lemonade, TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 3, 2019
item.description: Family Sunday in sanctuary, Tony let go, church in shock. Snow came, not near amount forecast, thankful. I took Ashley to Kroger on S. Walnut to sell cookies, at 434, only 16 away from next goal. Boys sledded. Ashley not 100% but did okay. Dillan had issues getting homework done.

item.title: Status Update – March 2, 2019
item.description: Ashley sick off/on. Pinewood Derby, boys were ecstatic, guessing they took 2nd place for respective dens, Dillan prizes for Best Paint, Most Realistic, didn’t see that coming. Boys had awesome time! Lesa sold cookies with Ashley at IGA, I took boys to Steak ‘n’ Shake. Wii and TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 1, 2019
item.description: Friday, Ashley moving slow, drove kids to school, 2 hours later get call, Ashley sick, has fever, come get her, Lesa picked her up, took her home. Worked full day, picked up boys. Pizza! Ashley still sick, Ibuprofen breaks fever, wears off, back to fever. Boys painted derby cars.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – March 1, 2019
item.description: Dave: Bruce, how was Mr Hudson’s office today? Bruce gave me a thumbs down. Dave: Good. Maybe you’ll think twice before doing that again. Dwyane: Mr Hudson is a spy. Lesa: A spy? Dwyane: He is! He was crawling on the floor. Spying on someone! Lesa: Maybe he dropped something and was looking for it? Dwyane: No, he’s a spy.

item.title: Status Update – February 28, 2019
item.description: Quarters day, dimes yesterday, Ashley’s class leading with $60. East Gate half-a-day. Lowe’s, bought Mitre saw, picked up kids. Cut derby cars, Dillan wedge car, boys excited to have a car, their first time. Church for Marriage Oneness Class, almost finished, next week last week.

item.title: Status Update – February 27, 2019
item.description: Lesa and I took kids to bus stop. Went to Dwyane’s Speech Conference at 9, talked about Dillan too, doing great! Lesa worked from home, I spent day at SAIC. Bruce wet himself in daycare van, bought him change of clothes from Dollar General. Kids played outside some. Homework. TV.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 27, 2019
item.description: Ashley: How come we don’t go to foster training anymore? Dave: Lesa and I got tired and decided to focus on taking care of you guys the best we can. Besides, we kind of don’t have the room for another foster kid. Ashley: When we get our new place and have the extra room maybe we can get a girl. I think it would be nice to have a girl around.

item.title: Status Update – February 26, 2019
item.description: Donated nickels to fight leukemia. Work okay, left at 4, picked up kids. Loretta called to cancel Ashley’s piano lesson, had to work. Kids wound up, acting crazy; made them play outside, clean their rooms. Lesa helped kids with homework, she’s a saint, especially with Dillan! TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 25, 2019
item.description: Pajama day at school, donated pennies to fight leukemia. My cubicle got moved, afternoon meeting, time to step up. Off at 4, stopped at Dollar General, washed truck, picked up kids. We went to Pack Meeting, Lesa too, watched boys receive awards, Dillan brought Rice Crispy treats.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 25, 2019
item.description: [A week ago Sunday, Lesa taught Dwyane how to cook scrambled eggs. Lesa instructed, Dwyane cooked. Yesterday morning …] Lesa: Dwyane, what would you like for breakfast? Dwyane: I would like scrambled eggs, but I’m kind of tired of cooking Mommy. Can you make them for me?

item.title: Status Update – February 24, 2019
item.description: Church, lead in back, Lesa stayed home. Ashley had World Day at Scouts, manipulated Amanda into buying her chicken nuggets. Bruce peed/pooped his pants, peed them yesterday and his bed Friday, not sure what’s going on with him. Kids played outside. Played Yahtzee with Ashley. TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 23, 2019
item.description: Up early, drove to Indianapolis for Foster Care Awareness Event at Chapel Rock Christian Church, Lesa and I were panelists, hope we help foster kids in some way, kids didn’t seem to mind. At home, sent kids outside to play until it started raining. Dinner, baths, TV. We’re tired.

item.title: Status Update – February 22, 2019
item.description: Friday, long week! About 70%, upper lip split while sleeping, nose bleeds off and on. Slow getting ready, took kids to school. Work seems like big hole. Left work on time, stopped at Stinson’s for Marriage Oneness DVD then picked up kids. Pizza, watched Hotel Transylvania 2, bed.

item.title: Status Update – February 21, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus. Still sick, simply miserable. Picked up kids a bit late. Took Ashley to Fayetteville to drop off World Day Scout project for Sunday. Skipped Marriage Oneness class, went to Springville Elem.’s STEAM night instead, Ashley had project on display. Kids had great time.

item.title: Status Update – February 20, 2019
item.description: Drove kids to school, Ashley had Science Fair project. I’m sick, was a really long day, and worked late too! Lesa bought craft items for Ashley’s World Day on Sunday, then picked kids up for me. Late supper, they waited until I got home, Ashley super-excited to see me. FDD photo.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 20, 2019
item.description: Ashley: How come we’re not going out to eat? Lesa: In our Marriage Oneness Class we talked about money and budgeting and we decided we eat out too much. Ashley: I hate your Marriage Oneness Class.

item.title: Status Update – February 19, 2019
item.description: Sick, running fever, flu? Called in, went back to sleep, Mr. Hudson called, Bruce expelled for hitting a kid in mouth, wanted me to get him. Spanking, no playing, made him work, in afternoon let him watch TV. Got other kids while Lesa made supper, she took Ashley to piano lesson.

item.title: Status Update – February 18, 2019
item.description: President’s Day, off work. Angel Jackson asked if we could take Lexi and Kash to school, Wes in hospital. I’m sick, couldn’t sleep, bad headache. Took Lesa to Taste of India for lunch, good time. Got kids from school. Took everyone except Bruce to Scouts, Bruce didn’t want to go.

item.title: Status Update – February 17, 2019
item.description: Church, I helped in Junior Church. Cold, misting and icy; cookie sells canceled, Ashley sad, we’re glad. Lesa went to Walmart, got clothes for kids, other items. Kids played on tablets, watched TV. Homework after dinner: Ashley spelling, Dwyane and Bruce reading, Dillan math. TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 16, 2019
item.description: Slept in, Dillan made me breakfast. Everyone, even Lesa, climbed into bed with me and got silly. Dillan has sore throat, feels sick. Low 30s, kids went out for short time. Took Ashley to Walmart, sold ton of cookies, we froze. Dwyane scared by Hookman story I told earlier in day.

item.title: Status Update – February 15, 2019
item.description: No problems at bus stop. Warmer with sunshine, ground still saturated and muddy. Picked up kids earlier than usual. Lesa grocery shopped. Pizza! Boys watched Ice Age; Lesa, Dillan, Ashley, myself played Monopoly, had good game and great time. Kids got to stay up later than usual.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 15, 2019
item.description: Bruce: Daddy, can you take us fishing sometime. Dave: Sure. Bruce: Daddy is the only one that ever catches any fish. Dave: Wait, I have to check my license. Bruce: What does that mean. Ashley: It means his fishing license could be out of order. Bruce: Huh? Lesa: It means it might be expired. Bruce: Huh? Dillan: It means it’s not good anymore. Like the expiration date on milk. Lesa: Very good.

item.title: Status Update – February 14, 2019
item.description: Kid told Bruce to shut up at bus stop, bullying him since November, called transportation on him. Quiet workday. I’ve got a cold, felt miserable most of the day. Valentines Day, I got Lesa and kids candy, got same in return. Took Ashley to Scouts, canceled. Went to Oneness class.

item.title: Status Update – February 13, 2019
item.description: Boys rode bus but wanted me to drop them at school. Lesa worked from home, took Ashley to dentist for her new spacer; it’s rubbing, making her tongue sore. Disastrous workday! Sun poked it’s head out. Picked kids up ½ hour late. Scout Online Safety video. Helped Dillan with Math.

item.title: Status Update – February 12, 2019
item.description: I’m exhausted. Kids rode bus. Second try to deliver cookies to Kathy, success! Talked with her awhile. Late getting kids again, supper was ready. Ashley could remember her piano homework so totally unprepared for tonight’s lesson, discussed dropping piano lessons with her. Windy!

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 12, 2019
item.description: Bruce: Mommy, can I tell you something? Lesa: Sure. [Bruce walked over and acted like he was going to tell Lesa something but climbed into her lap instead.] Lesa: I thought you wanted to tell me something? Bruce: No, I just wanted to snuggle with you. [I think he kind of did tell her something.]

item.title: Status Update – February 11, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus. Started out warm, got cold and rainy as day went on. Tried to deliver Kathy Mitchell’s cookies, no one home. Picked kids up later than usual because of, Lesa had dinner on table waiting. Boys had Cub Scouts. Ashley stayed home, did science project. Big kid showers.

item.title: Status Update – February 10, 2019
item.description: Church, Serving Deacon. Icy roads AM, okay PM. Arby’s. Great Clips, boys got buzzed, #4 on top, #2 on sides, they look good! Michaels Art store. Kids played outside. Took Ashley to Rural King to sell cookies, McDonald’s, church. Lesa stayed home with boys, watched Ant Man & Wasp.

item.title: Status Update – February 9, 2019
item.description: We slept in until 8:30! Lazy morning, almost late going to Lowe’s where Ashley was selling cookies, she was hyped up all day. Gabe and Gracie here when we got home, all the kids went to their house to play on trampoline. Played Yahtzee with Dillan, Ashley and Dwyane. Showers, TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 8, 2019
item.description: Friday! Dropped kids at daycare. Sun came out but cold, water from last few days frozen. Kids had school Valentine’s parties. Picked up kids. Lesa watched boys. I took Ashley to dinner at Casa Brava. At Father-Daughter Dance, she danced with me 5 times! Steak ‘n’ Shake afterward.

item.title: Status Update – February 7, 2019
item.description: Rained hard, Springville under water, worst flood in remembered history. Cold front, storms, tornado sirens. School asked parents to get kids, buses unable, 2-hour delay tomorrow, We all got home safe. Oneness class canceled. Ashley, Scouts learned First-Aid; took ambulance ride.

item.title: Status Update – February 6, 2019
item.description: Rained hard all day, ground totally saturated. Kids rode bus. Valentines delivered to classmates and teachers, kids ready for party on Friday. Work okay, appears I’m still in map business. Picked up kids. Stayed home, went nowhere. Ashley spent evening making BD gifts for Brilee.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 6, 2019
item.description: Bruce: Mommy, was I good tonight? Lesa: I didn’t have to yell at you even once. Bruce: Good! If we have a snow day tomorrow then I can stay home with you!

item.title: Status Update – February 5, 2019
item.description: Woke up tired! Kids wanted me to drive them to school, except Dillan, he rode bus, drove rest to school. Spent half day at East Gate (SAIC) in software and map meetings, guess that’s good, new work on top of old. Picked up kids. Took Ashley to piano lessons. Watched SOTU address.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 5, 2019
item.description: Bruce: Daddy, can you scratch my back? Dave: Sure. Bruce, about a minute later, and obviously unhappy with my effort, said: Daddy, you can stop. Mommy is the best scratcher backer.

item.title: Status Update – February 4, 2019
item.description: What a long day! Packed 4 boxes of cookies around, 1 for daycare, 1 for school, 2 for my work. Dropped kids at school because of Ashley’s cookies and Bruce’s snacks and drinks. Took cookies to Sonja at HTO, felt a bit surreal. Picked up kids and took boys to Scouts. I’m wore out!

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 4, 2019
item.description: Dwyane, to the checkout lady at Jay C’s: Can I tell you something? Checkout lady: Sure. Dwyane: My Mommy has never had a baby.

item.title: Status Update – February 3, 2019
item.description: Intentional Parenting class, Family Sunday. Lesa and I had big fight, frightened kids, all’s well. Dillan at Gabe’s, video games, trampoline. I took Ashley to Rural King, sold cookies. Lesa took boys to see animals, wound up trampolining too. Late supper, bedtime. Superbowl LIII.

item.title: Status Update – February 2, 2019
item.description: Slept until 8! Helped Dillan do homework. Ashley piano. Took her to IGA to sell cookies, CVS for Dwyane and Lesa’s scripts, Wendy’s. Lesa took boys, dogs for walk to mailbox. Kids played inside/outside, Dillan went to Gabe’s, rest played with slime, bugged me about Wii, Monopoly.

item.title: Status Update – February 1, 2019
item.description: Full day of school. Took chili to work for Fourth Friday Lunch. Forced off road by truck and trailer that lost control on ice, managed to save it without wrecking or damage to truck. Lesa took Dwyane to doctor for earache. I picked up other kids and Ashley’s cookies. Papa John’s!

item.title: Status Update – January 31, 2019
item.description: 2-hour delay became school closure, took kids to daycare, can’t afford another day off, I hate that. Feel like job is slipping away, trying not to panic. Worked over, late getting kids, rushed supper. Ashley had Scouts, we had Oneness class. Lesa made chili for my lunch pitch-in.

item.title: Status Update – January 30, 2019
item.description: Subzero temps, -30⁄40 wind chills, kids stayed home, Lesa and I worked from home, actually got some work done. Kids did lots of homework, Dillan did catch-up work as well. Bedroom blanket forts, tablets. Took Lesa and kids to Golden Corral, used Bruce and Dwyane’s discounts. Wii.

item.title: Status Update – January 29, 2019
item.description: Cold, wind chill, sub-zero temps here. Kids rode bus, picked them up from daycare later than usual, they didn’t notice. School closed on Wednesday already. Loretta cancelled Ashley’s piano lesson. Went to get gas with Ashley, Lesa called, toilet flooded, Dillan watched me repair.

item.title: Status Update – January 28, 2019
item.description: Fairly normal morning/day. Mrs Harp sent Dillan’s report card home early, and a note: seven Fs, one B in Art, several failed assignments, plus 19 missing! I was livid, grounded him from playing! Scout Pack meeting, many awards, Ashley went too. Record-breaking deep freeze on way.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – January 28, 2019
item.description: I was doing 60 mph in a 55 mph zone when I passed a patrol car going the opposite way, and said: Oh crap, I hope he doesn’t turn around. All the kids turned their heads to look, and sure enough, the patrol car turned around, and headed back toward us. The kids yelled: He’s turning around! Dave: He’d better hurry or he won’t see which way I’m turning and he’ll have to guess (as I made a left onto 54 toward Bloomfield).

item.title: Status Update – January 27, 2019
item.description: Icy roads on way to church, first parenting class. Boys acted like brothers, sledded together all day. Ashley made Valentines for Veterans with Scouts, prize for most creative. Blanket fort up/down multiple times. Oneness homework. Lesa helped Bruce read, I helped Dillan do math.
